name: Dingo Berry in CREAM FIENDS
description:
⌹  ⌹ DINGO BERRY  ⌹  ⌹
▓  ⌹   IN  ⌹   ▓
 ⌹  ⌹ C R E A M  F I E N D S  ⌹  ⌹ Help Young Dingo on his 16th Birthday in Order to Help His Two Boyfriends 
Overcome a Serious Disease.
BUT!
Surprise! There is only enough Ancient Tech onology to save one of them.
Which will you choose ? ? ?
The Most difficult DECISION YOU WILL MAKE IN YOUR LIFETIME. this RPG is for the So Good it's Bad Jam 2018. thanks for your  playing - nilson ☜  "Only Serious RPG fans should Imply"

☜  "TEN MINUTES OF GRUESOMELY RADICAL JAPANESE ROLE-PLAYING FUN"

☜  "This GAME stinks up my Hole HOUSE! TEN OUT OF ELEVEN."

☜  "I JUST CANNOT stop... thinking about this game !"

☜  "CREAM FIENDS [...] !"
